system:
note description: "Intermediary routines between gtk and eiffel." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xmlEV_INTERMEDIARY_ROUTINES
inherit ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xmlEV_GTK_DEPENDENT_INTERMEDIARY_ROUTINES
../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Timeout intermediary agent routine
f_on_timeout_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_on_timeout_intermediaryon_timeout_intermediary (a_object_id: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Timeout has occurred. local a_timeout_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_timeout_imp.xmlEV_TIMEOUT_IMP do a_timeout_imp ?= Falseeif_id_object (a_object_id) if a_timeout_imp /= Void then a_timeout_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_timeout_i.xml#f_on_timeouton_timeout end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP} -- Notebook intermediary agent routines
f_on_notebook_page_switch_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_on_notebook_page_switch_intermediaryon_notebook_page_switch_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER; a_page: FalseNATURAL_32) -- Notebook page is switched local a_notebook_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_IMP do a_notebook_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) check a_notebook_imp /= Void then end a_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_page_switchpage_switch (a_page.Falseto_integer_32) end
feature -- Expose actions intermediary agent routines
f_create_expose_actions_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_create_expose_actions_intermediarycreate_expose_actions_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER; a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Area needs to be redrawn local l_drawing_area_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_drawing_area_imp.xmlEV_DRAWING_AREA_IMP l_pixmap_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP do l_drawing_area_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) if l_drawing_area_imp /= Void then l_drawing_area_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_drawing_area_imp.xml#f_call_expose_actionscall_expose_actions (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height) else l_pixmap_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) if l_pixmap_imp /= Void then l_pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_call_expose_actionscall_expose_actions (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height) end end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP} -- Gauge intermediary agent routines
f_on_gauge_value_changed_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_on_gauge_value_changed_intermediaryon_gauge_value_changed_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Gauge value changed local a_gauge_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_gauge_imp.xmlEV_GAUGE_IMP do a_gauge_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) check a_gauge_imp /= Void then end a_gauge_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_gauge_imp.xml#f_value_changed_handlervalue_changed_handler end
feature -- Widget intermediary agent routines
f_on_size_allocate_intermediate../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_on_size_allocate_intermediateon_size_allocate_intermediate (a_object_id, a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Size allocate happened on widget. local a_widget: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP do a_widget ?= Falseeif_id_object (a_object_id) if a_widget /= Void and then not a_widget.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed then a_widget.../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_on_size_allocateon_size_allocate (a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height) end end
f_on_set_focus_event_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_on_set_focus_event_intermediaryon_set_focus_event_intermediary (a_object_id: FalseINTEGER_32; a_widget_ptr: FalsePOINTER) -- Set Focus handling intermediary. local a_window: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xmlEV_WINDOW_IMP do a_window ?= Falseeif_id_object (a_object_id) if a_window /= Void and then not a_window.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed then a_window.../implementation_gtk/ev_window_imp.xml#f_on_set_focus_eventon_set_focus_event (a_widget_ptr) end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP} -- Text component intermediary agent routines
f_text_component_change_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_text_component_change_intermediarytext_component_change_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Changed local a_text_component_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_text_component_imp.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT_IMP do a_text_component_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) check a_text_component_imp /= Void then end a_text_component_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_text_component_imp.xml#f_on_change_actionson_change_actions end
f_text_field_return_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_text_field_return_intermediarytext_field_return_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Return local l_text_field_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_text_field_imp.xmlEV_TEXT_FIELD_IMP do l_text_field_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) check l_text_field_imp /= Void then end if attached l_text_field_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_text_field_action_sequences_i.xml#f_return_actions_internalreturn_actions_internal as l_text_field_return_actions then l_text_field_return_actions.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall (Void) end end
feature -- Button intermediary agent routines
f_button_select_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_button_select_intermediarybutton_select_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Selected local l_button_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_button_imp.xmlEV_BUTTON_IMP l_rad_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP do l_button_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) l_rad_imp ?= l_button_imp if l_rad_imp /= Void and then not l_rad_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected then elseif l_button_imp /= Void and then attached l_button_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_button_action_sequences_i.xml#f_select_actions_internalselect_actions_internal as l_button_imp_select_actions and then l_button_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp /= Void then l_button_imp_select_actions.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall (Void) end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP} -- Menu intermediary agent routines
f_menu_item_activate_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_menu_item_activate_intermediarymenu_item_activate_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Item activated local a_menu_item_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xmlEV_MENU_ITEM_IMP do a_menu_item_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) if a_menu_item_imp /= Void and then a_menu_item_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_allow_on_activateallow_on_activate then a_menu_item_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_app_implementationApp_implementation.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_do_once_on_idledo_once_on_idle (agent a_menu_item_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_menu_item_imp.xml#f_on_activateon_activate) end end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xmlEV_ANY_IMP} -- Dialog intermediary agent routines
f_color_dialog_on_ok_intermediary../implementation_gtk/ev_intermediary_routines.xml#f_color_dialog_on_ok_intermediarycolor_dialog_on_ok_intermediary (a_c_object: FalsePOINTER) -- Color dialog ok local a_color_dialog_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xmlEV_COLOR_DIALOG_IMP do a_color_dialog_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_dependent_intermediary_routines.xml#f_c_get_eif_reference_from_object_idc_get_eif_reference_from_object_id (a_c_object) check a_color_dialog_imp /= Void then end a_color_dialog_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_standard_dialog_imp.xml#f_on_okon_ok end
